statements: UPDATE player_statistics SET speed = 5.5, agility = 7.3, endurance = 6.8 WHERE player_id = 1;
UPDATE player_statistics SET agility = 8.2, speed = 6.9, endurance = 5.7 WHERE player_id = 2;
UPDATE player_statistics SET speed = 7.5, agility = 8.6 WHERE player_id = 100
UPDATE player_statistics SET endurance = 6.2, speed = 9.3 WHERE player_id = 200
UPDATE player_stats SET speed = 10.5, agility = 8.3 WHERE player_id = 1;
UPDATE player_goals SET goal_description = 'Score a hat-trick' WHERE player_id = 2;

UPDATE player_goals SET goal_description = 'Scored a magnificent goal' WHERE player_id = 200;
UPDATE player_statistics SET speed = 10.5, agility = 8.2 WHERE player_id = 1;
UPDATE player_improvements SET improvement_description = 'Improved endurance training' WHERE improvement_id = 3;
UPDATE player_statistics SET speed = 10, agility = 8.5 WHERE player_id = 1;
UPDATE player_improvements SET improvement_description = 'Focus on accuracy' WHERE player_id = 2 AND area_id = 1;
UPDATE players SET speed = 60, agility = 75 WHERE player_name = 'John Doe';
UPDATE endurance_stats SET endurance_measure = 95, recorded_date = '2022-08-15' WHERE player_id = 3;
UPDATE players SET speed = 80, endurance = 75 WHERE player_id = 1;
